snippet.title: Flat Heroes on Switch Review
snippet.description:
It’s hip to be square.

Flat Heroes for the Nintendo Switch is available on August 2nd. We’ve got an early review with some gameplay footage ahead of its release.

Footage courtesy of our friend, The Nindie Spotlight.


Join our Discord!
https://discord.gg/Hyp4mXm

Support this channel and our site:
http://patreon.com/nwr

Visit the motherland:
http://www.ninwr.com
